headlines.title: India AI Summit 2025 Kicks Off with Record Attendance
headlines.description: The annual India AI Summit has begun with over 10,000 attendees exploring the latest in artificial intelligence.

headlines.title: Intel Launches New AI PC Chips Optimized for Local LLMs
headlines.description: Intel's latest Core Ultra processors enable running large language models entirely on personal computers.

headlines.title: Renewable Energy Investments Hit All-Time High
headlines.description: Global investments in solar and wind energy have reached unprecedented levels.

entertainment.title: Bollywood Film Breaks Box Office Records
entertainment.description: The latest blockbuster has become the highest-grossing Indian film in international markets.

entertainment.title: Music Streaming Hits New Peak in India
entertainment.description: Digital music consumption has reached record levels with millions of new subscribers.

entertainment.title: International Film Festival Announces Lineup
entertainment.description: The prestigious festival will showcase diverse films from over 50 countries.

science.title: ISRO Announces Ambitious Space Mission
science.description: India's space agency reveals plans for advanced deep space exploration missions.

science.title: Breakthrough in Quantum Computing Announced
science.description: Researchers achieve significant milestone in quantum error correction.

science.title: Climate Scientists Report Positive Developments
science.description: New data suggests some environmental protection measures are showing results.
